channel.title: Go Humble! RSS BOOKS
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle books bundles!

item.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Heroes in a Half-Shell
item.description: Leo, Don, Raph, and Mike in one bundle
item.content:encoded:
Follow the iconic adventures of the legendary Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles with our latest Humble Comics Bundle! The TMNT team of Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael, and Michelangelo has been kicking butt and protecting New York City since 1984—across the big screen, TV, and comics. Order a pizza (without anchovies) and read the very best TMNT comics like Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Vol. 1: Return to New York, Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Last Ronin, and more. Save some green on awesome comics with Humble Bundle, and help support Make-A-Wish with your purchase—COWABUNGA!

The titles in this bundle are available through Kobo.com. To access the content, create or log in to your Kobo.com account.

item.title: Cisco Networking and Certification by Cisco Press/Pearson
item.content:encoded:
Ready to take your Cisco networking certification exams seriously? Then you need the latest Humble Tech Book Bundle from Pearson. Learn everything you need from IT support to security identity management within one curated library of courses.

Get the hottest and most comprehensive official certification guides like CCNP SPCOR 350-501, CCNP and CCIE Security Core SCOR 350-701, and more—plus, the prep guide, 31 Days Before your CCNA Exam. Dominate your exams and help support Active Minds with your purchase.

item.title: Warhammer RPG Starter Bundle by Cubicle7
item.content:encoded:
Gather up your party for endless adventure with our latest tabletop role-playing game collection, Warhammer RPG Starter Bundle by Cubicle7. No two conquests for the Imperium of Man are the same with endless fun ahead. This expansive TTRPG explorer’s kit contains rulebooks, sourcebooks, and campaign resources based in the Warhammer 40,000 universe like Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Soulbound, Warhammer 40;000: Wrath & Glory, Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay, and more. Get everything you need to embark on an epic journey together, and help support Children's Health Foundation with your purchase.

The ebooks in this bundle are available through the DriveThru RPG website.

item.title: XCrawl Xtreme Dungeon Crawl Superbundle by Goodman Games
item.content:encoded:
Xtreme fun awaits with the all-new XCrawl Xtreme Dungeon Crawl Superbundle by Goodman Games! Explore a world that’s a twisted reflection of our own—roleplay as a hero in a live-streaming-obsessed society where fame, power, and survival are always on the line. This library includes thrilling campaigns like Xcrawl Classics #6: Dooms 2 Go, Xcrawl Classics #2: Tropicrawl Cataclysm, and more. Everything you need to embark on epic adventures is packed into these Xcrawl gamebooks and beyond. Pay what you want for a fresh twist on the classic tabletop role-playing formula and help support It Gets Better with your purchase.

The titles in this bundle are available through two partners: some on DTRPG, and some with Goodman.

item.title: The Boys Vs. Everyone
item.content:encoded: Bloody good graphic novels are here—follow the gruesome adventures of Billy Butcher and The Boys as they take on Vought and Homelander with our latest Humble Comics Bundle: The Boys Vs. Everyone! This collection of graphic novels is not for the faint of heart—but if you enjoy hyper-violence, action, suspense, and a gritty take on the superhero genre, then this series is for you. Get all 12 volumes of The Boys, plus Evil Ernie, Sacred Six, and more. Get ahead of the streaming series before the new season drops and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund.

item.title: Electronics for the Curious by No Starch
item.content:encoded: Expand your horizons or pick up new hobbies with our latest Tech Book Bundle: Electronics for the Curious. This expansive ebook library from No Starch is a curated collection of titles designed to make technology approachable and fun to learn. Dive into engaging reads like The Game Console 2.0—a visual homage to video game consoles throughout history, Open Circuits—a photographic journey into the beautiful design inside everyday electronics, Arduino for Arduinians—a hands-on guide to mastering this versatile microcontroller platform, and more! Pay what you want to level up your personal library and help support the Electronic Frontier Foundation.

item.title: Swords and Wizardry RPG Mega Bundle by Necromancer Games
item.description: Unleash the Legends of Old-School Fantasy
item.content:encoded: For fifteen years, Frog God Games and Necromancer Games have been the torchbearers of sword-and-sorcery adventure, bringing Swords & Wizardry players hundreds of sprawling dungeons, haunted wildernesses, and perilous towns to explore. Now, for the first time ever, you can claim a colossal treasure trove of 60+ titles, all in PDF form, spanning adventures, campaign settings, monsters, and rule expansions. Whether you’re a grizzled dungeon-crawling veteran or a new initiate to the OSR, this collection arms you with everything needed to run years of campaigns dripping with danger, discovery, and dark fantasy. But the bundle doesn’t stop with digital loot. At the highest tier, you’ll also receive a true collector’s prize: Heart of the Razor in hardcover print-a legendary adventure book nearly out of circulation. Only 500 copies remain, and once they’re gone, they’re gone forever. This is your last chance to hold a piece of Swords & Wizardry history in your hands, straight from the Frog God vault. Every dollar supports both the publishers who have carried the OSR flame and Child’s Play. You’ll get classic adventures, rare treasures, and a seat at the fire with the gods of old-school gaming.

item.title: Fall in Love With Shojo by Kodansha
item.content:encoded: Fill up on shojo manga this fall as Kodansha and Humble team-up to offer fans digital volumes of dramatic, heartwarming, and surprising sagas during the Fall In Love With Shojo Bundle! Just $30 gets you more than 80 digital volumes and over $900 worth of manga. This includes all volumes of modern classics like the love story steeped in trauma and healing, MARS, the magical girl adventure Shugo Chara!, the frenemies and lovers high school rom-com, Peach Girl, and more. Not only that but fans can catch up on nearly all volumes of the ongoing tender and wholesome school days romance, A Condition Called Love. It’s a perfect bundle for anyone who loves shojo or is curious to try some of Kodansha’s best. Explore amazing shojo manga from Kodansha and help support The BINC Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: Ultimate Programming Languages Bundle by Packt
item.content:encoded: Unlock the world of programming with Packt’s Ultimate Programming Languages Bundle. Whether you’re writing your very first line of code or levelling up your professional skills, this collection of 35 expert books will guide you through today’s most important languages. Start at the foundation with accessible guides to Python and JavaScript, perfect for beginners who want to grasp the essentials quickly. Move up a tier to expand your toolkit with Java, C++, and Go, plus deeper dives into object-oriented programming and clean software design. Pay a little more and gain full access to the complete library of 26 additional titles, covering Rust, Kotlin, Swift, TypeScript, PHP, and Haskell alongside advanced Python, C++, and Java resources. Explore cookbooks, design pattern handbooks, and in-depth problem solvers that help you write cleaner, faster, and more professional code. This bundle is your passport to mastering the full spectrum of modern programming. Whether your goal is to build software from scratch, explore functional and object-oriented paradigms, or sharpen your craft with advanced techniques, you’ll find the resources here. Best of all, your purchase helps support charity while you expand your coding skills.

item.title: Image in the 2000s
item.content:encoded: Head back to the turn of the millennium, courtesy of Image Comics! Pick up acclaimed series including Chew, I Kill Giants, Age of Bronze, and more. Plus, expand your collection with the continued adventures of legendary characters like Spawn, Savage Dragon, and Witchblade. Thousands of pages await your virtual bookshelf, and each purchase supports The Book Industry Charitable Foundation!

item.title: Dungeon Master’s Guild Top Content from the D&D Community
item.content:encoded:
Gather your party and unleash the full might of Dungeons & Dragons with this ultimate D&D accessories bundle! Forged in partnership with the Dungeon Masters Guild and authorized by Wizards of the Coast, this legendary collection spills over with challenging adventures, groundbreaking rule expansions, and must-have player options. Brave sprawling modern epics like Call From the Deep and The Haunt, or level up your campaign with treasure troves of character options from Xanathar’s Lost Notes to Everything Else. Whether you’re a shapeshifting Druid, relentless Barbarian, or iron-willed Monk, this bundle is a veritable loot table of D&D treasures. Expand your table, ignite your imagination, and join the fight for good — every purchase supports Extra Life!

The titles in this bundle are available through two partners: some on DMsGuild, and some with Roll20.

item.title: Cloud Infrastructure and DevOps Toolkit by Packt
item.description: Live in the clouds with AWS & Azure
item.content:encoded: Become a 21st-century superstar with the latest Humble Tech Book Bundle: Cloud Infrastructure and DevOps Toolkit. Learn the intricacies of Amazon Web Services with industry-leading courses like AWS for Solutions Architects and AWS Cloud Projects—master Microsoft Azure with professional-quality lessons like Hands-On MLOps on Azure and Azure for Developers. This comprehensive library includes lessons, practice tests, and resources perfect for novices and seasoned professionals alike—build strong foundations in cloud infrastructure and help support No Kid Hungry with your purchase.
